name: Smile Quest
description:
Game Story

The world was once a place full of joy and happiness, where everyone smiled their way through every day. But a terrible disaster changed everything. People's smiles gradually disappeared, and they became sad and angry. So, a mysterious traveler arrived in this world and decided to bring back people's smiles and happiness through their own adventure and struggle.

Gameplay

Players take on the role of the traveler, exploring different areas and domains in the game, solving puzzles and completing tasks to gain smiles and happiness. Players need to use the controller to control the character's movement and actions to interact with the world and solve puzzles. Players also need to interact with different NPCs to get quests and learn more about the world.

Storyline

Players will start in a desolate world where there are no smiles, only silence and sadness. The traveler needs to find the seed of a smile, which is the only thing that can bring back smiles and happiness. However, this seed is locked in a castle that is controlled by an evil wizard. Players need to complete a series of tasks, defeat the wizard and his minions, solve puzzles, and collect items to reach the castle and retrieve the seed of the smile.

During the journey, players will encounter many challenging terrains and puzzles that require jumping, climbing, rolling, and using special skills to complete. Players also need to interact with other NPCs to get quests and collect information. After successfully completing tasks and collecting all necessary items, players will obtain the seed of the smile and bring back smiles and happiness to the world.
